com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.hbase

Class HBaseTransaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.common.AbstractStoreTransaction
      • com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.hbase.HBaseTransaction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StoreTransaction, TransactionHandle

    public class HBaseTransaction
extends AbstractStoreTransaction
    This class overrides and adds nothing compared with ConsistentKeyLockTransaction; however, it creates a transaction type specific to HBase, which lets us check for user errors like passing a Cassandra transaction into a HBase method.
    Author:
    Dan LaRocque
